document.full_text: heather hitchens, presently the executive director at the new york state council on the arts, will take on that role at the american theater wing, which is a presenter of the tony awards.
document.title: new york state arts official to run the american theater wing
lines_and_colors: heather hitchens, presently the executive director at the new york state council on the arts, will take on that role at the american theater wing, which is a presenter of the tony awards.
